an9.37:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
an9.37:1.2: Tatra kho āyasmā ānando bhikkhū āmantesi:
an9.37:1.4: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paccassosuṁ.
an9.37:2.2: Yāvañcidaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sambādhe okāsādhigamo anubuddho sattānaṁ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṁ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya.
an9.37:2.3: Tadeva nāma cakkhuṁ bhavissati te rūpā tañcāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedissati.
an9.37:2.4: Tadeva nāma sotaṁ bhavissati te saddā tañcāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedissati.
an9.37:2.5: Tadeva nāma ghānaṁ bhavissati te gandhā tañcāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedissati.
an9.37:2.6: Sāva nāma jivhā bhavissati te rasā tañcāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedissati.
an9.37:2.7: Sova nāma kāyo bhavissati te phoṭṭhabbā tañcāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedissatī”ti.
an9.37:3.1: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
an9.37:3.2: “saññīmeva nu kho, āvuso ānanda, tadāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedeti udāhu asaññī”ti?
an9.37:3.3: “Saññīmeva kho, āvuso, tadāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedeti, no asaññī”ti.
an9.37:4.2: “Idhāvuso, bhikkhu, sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an9.37:4.3: Evaṁsaññīpi kho, āvuso, tadāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedeti.
an9.37:5.1: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an9.37:5.2: Evaṁsaññīpi kho, āvuso, tadāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedeti.
an9.37:6.1: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an9.37:6.2: Evaṁsaññīpi kho, āvuso, tadāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedetīti.
an9.37:7.1: Ekamidāhaṁ, āvuso, samayaṁ sākete viharāmi añjanavane migadāye.
an9.37:7.2: Atha kho, āvuso, jaṭilavāsikā bhikkhunī yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho, āvuso, jaṭilavāsikā bhikkhunī maṁ etadavoca:
an9.37:7.3: ‘yāyaṁ, bhante ānanda, samādhi na cābhinato na cāpanato na ca sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato,
an9.37:7.4: vimuttattā ṭhito, ṭhitattā santusito, santusitattā no paritassati.
an9.37:7.5: Ayaṁ, bhante ānanda, samādhi kiṁphalo vutto bhagavatā’ti?
an9.37:8.1: Evaṁ vutte, sohaṁ, āvuso, jaṭilavāsikaṁ bhikkhuniṁ etadavocaṁ:
an9.37:8.2: ‘yāyaṁ, bhagini, samādhi na cābhinato na cāpanato na ca sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato,
an9.37:8.3: vimuttattā ṭhito, ṭhitattā santusito, santusitattā no paritassati.
an9.37:8.4: Ayaṁ, bhagini, samādhi aññāphalo vutto bhagavatā’ti.
an9.37:8.5: Evaṁsaññīpi kho, āvuso, tadāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedetī”ti.
